title: Prime Minister of Saudi Arabia - Wikipedia
snippet: After the deposition of Saud in 1964, Faisal succeeded him as king, while remaining prime minister. From that point until the appointment of Mohammed bin Salman as prime minister by King Salman, the two offices were merged.

title: Mohammed bin Salman - Wikipedia
snippet: Mohammed bin Salman was born on 31 August 1985 to Prince Salman bin Abdulaziz (later King of Saudi Arabia) and his third wife, Fahda bint Falah Al Hithlain. He is the eldest of his mother's six children and the eighth child and seventh son of his father. His full siblings include Prince Turki ...

title: Saudi Arabia - Heads of Government Listing - HOG
snippet: The Heads of Government listing is a database that contains information on the names and titles of heads of state, heads of government, foreign ministers and in some cases, ministers responsible for development assistance.
